channel.title: Half Life/Doctor Who fanfic
channel.description:
So...it's been a while since I posted in this forum. In fact last time I did was last year I believe. Anyway I've been making a Half Life/Doctor Who fan fiction crossover. It's not finished (still have a chapter or two to go) however if anyone is a fan of Doctor Who as well as half life you may like it :slight_smile:
Here is the lack of cake> [url]https://www.fanfiction.net/s/5989566/1/Thats_Impossible[/url]

item.title: Half Life/Doctor Who fanfic
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
Not a fan of Dr Who to be honest, so it wasn’t really my sort of thing. I did dabble in a little Half-Life fan-fic a couple of years ago. Didn’t get very far though!

If you have masochistic tendencies…
